parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of hieros; a sacred place, i.e. The entire precincts of the Temple.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a people.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
